name: Elephant Simulator Unlimited
description:
What's that rumble sound? Are we having an earthquake? No, its just a Giant Elephant! You are in control of this huge beast. Each 3000 Points you earn, she will grow. These Elepahnts are super strong and love to create chaos. Smash cars, tractors, goats, planes, fire hydrants, people, men,women,wheels, quad bikes, and anything else not attached to the ground. Smashing cars is his speciality. Red rally race cars are his favorite. Basically, she's looking to smash stuff. Help this African Safari creature grow from a little guy in Level 1 to a Giant in Level 50. Race around off the road or on the highway missions. Find the Airport and smash all the airplanes. There's even some Football surprises to be found. Now you will know what it feels like to be a tourist at Kruger Park who gets their car flipped over.

This game combines elements of rampage style games with adventure games. 72 missions and loads of achievements. Try to rank in the Top 10 in the world with this mind bending sim! Awesome 3D effects!
Features:
--72 Missions
--6 Action Packed Maps ! HUGE TERRITORIES!
--Loads of achievements
--World Rankings for the best #1 Ranked Elephant
--Combines rampage with adventure
--Excellent 3D graphics and fast gameplay
--The more you play, the more he grows
--The sim that has it all and more!
If you ever wondered what it would be like to play a Elephant Simulator, this is your chance. Rampage the city or country farm. Smash everything in the city
Notes: At this point, level 50 is max size - -and by Level 50 she will be so big, you will be laughing. She goes up by 1 Level each 3000 points that is scored. This app works best on newer devices. If you say it does not work, you are saying you have a pretty bad smartphone. If you enjoy playing a Shark, Goat, Crocodile, Snake, Wolf, Tiger, Cheetah, Dinosaur, or Horse Simulator, you are probably going to love this game. Connect with us @jellyfishgiant
